document_data.name: Laelar
document_data.mainbody: '''Laelar''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Bane]] and henchman of the [[High Imperceptor of Bane|High Imperceptor]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a ''[[rod of smiting]]'' and had a ''[[rope of climbing]]''.
document_data.Relationships: He was a henchman to the High Imperceptor of Bane.
